actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Relating to the discount factors applicable to medical malpractice companies under section 846 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

summary.text: Allows medical malpractice insurance companies to elect to use the discount factors pursuant to the special rule for international and reinsurance lines of business until January 1, 1994.

titles.title: Relating to the discount factors applicable to medical malpractice companies under section 846 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
